DOC.brief_summary: This study aimed to validate new recipes for cow's milk, hen's egg, soy, cod and wheat, to be used in blinded low-dose food challenges.
DOC.brief_title: New Validated Recipes for Double-blind Placebo-controlled Low Dose Food Challenges
DOC.criteria: Children belonging to one of two age groups: 78 years or 1415 years No previous hypersensitivity reaction to the food to be tested Capacity to understand the test instructions and to participate in the test sessions Children not belonging to one of the two age groups: 78 years or 1415 years One or more previous hypersensitivity reaction to the food to be tested Unability to understand the test instructions and to participate in the test sessions
